#summary Download page
=P7 Library v1.7.5=
[http://code.google.com/p/baical/source/checkout Checkout] latest source code:
Changes list:
 * Fixed: remove platform specific code from list class
 * Fixed: Fixed compilation issue for Win32/64 platform
=Baical v0.6.6=
[http://baical.googlecode.com/files/Baical_v0.6.6.zip Download] latest version.<br/>
Changes list:
 * Added: Baical. VS 2010 redistributable libraries
 * Added: Baical. Status bar with start time & internal error counter
 * Baical. Specify default values in configuration file 
 * Fixed: P7.Telemetry viewer. Calculate points average value more precisely
 * Fixed: P7.Telemetry viewer. Show enhanced point information on click
 * Fixed: P7.Telemetry viewer. Rework cyclogram drawing algo
 * Fixed: P7.Telemetry viewer. Min/Max changes were not taken in account
 * Fixed: P7.Trace Viewer. Saving and restoring maximized window state & coordinates
=Angara v0.9.8=
[http://baical.googlecode.com/files/Angara_v0.9.8.zip Download]  latest version.
Changes list:
 * Added: Send internal logs to Baical server
 * Fixed: TMF parsing error

=Additional software=
You may have to install in addition [http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=5555 Visual C++ 2010 Redistributable]<br/>
